text: Hidden Tomb

While traversing the inhabited wilderness, one of your soldiers fell through a crack in the ground. While sending others through the now opened crack to rescue him, the soldiers below get excited: it’s a big underground tomb! More soldiers go underground to take what is still useful for the benefit of our people.
Abandoned Camp

After a long march in the middle of the night, the army vanguard finds an abandoned camp hidden between some mountains. The camp is already set and has plenty of supplies and comfortable bedrolls already laid down. You make some soldiers taste the supplies and check the camp for traps but there seems to be no problem whatsoever. Your army prepares for a relaxing and welcomed rest.
Buried Relics

A strange chittering noise is heard by the soldiers while passing the administrative building in an abandoned village. Upon further inspection an underground passage is discovered beneath the floor of the central building. A small team inspect the passage, finding a cache of goods hidden in a small room. They say the tunnels descend further, but the lord believes that to search further is unnecessary, as the sudden silence is too revealing. There are secrets better left alone…
Hidden Temple

While traversing the ruins of an old city, the army finds a temple of their god, that seems to be untouched by time. The lord and his retinue enter to pray for a night and day. After they leave the holy site, a blessed sensation fills the army with renewed vigor.
Caravan Remnants

A cloud of smoke can be seen not far away from the army encampment. A group of soldiers is sent quickly to inspect the cause of the fire. They found a caravan recently attacked but not completely sacked. Beastmen and Cathayans bodies were littered through the plain. There were no survivors. Whatever was salvageable was retrieved back to the quartermaster to make available for the usage of the army.
Legendary Bard Rescued

While marching through the rode, a desperate horseman requests the army follows him and protects his small village from a slaver raid. The army manages to get there in time and as the slavers are put through the sword and prisoners liberated, one of the prisoners offers a song to the lord. Enchanting and extremely talented the bard is recognized but most of the soldiers as a really famous musician of the realm. The bard goes its merry way thanking you and telling your lord a new song about them will join its repertoire.
Whispers Of Our God

While traversing the land the lord suddenly feels tired of the road and decides that the army must camp for the night. While dreaming, the dream becomes vivid and god materializes in the dream. With words of courage and power it inspires the lord. The lord spokes this to the men, making them feel that they can beat anyone and anything in their path.
Friendly Training
The Explorer

A regiment of explorers from Tilea approaches you, with the clear intention of asking our army for help: they tell us that from where we are they would prefer to have our weapons to advance since the path becomes more dangerous. They are willing to accompany us for a few days on our journey to ensure our protection until we reach their destination. They seem quite useful, since being so few have managed to survive in clearly hostile and dangerous territory. You decide to take them with you.\\n

The men of the two armies lie mixed and weary all around the field, but smiling and content. They gather all night around campfires and celebrate the skirmish without caring about the winner. In the morning the general greets you and thanks you. They will continue on their way with their spirits high and ready to face whatever comes their way.\\n
A Friendly Proposal Rejected
The ally general leaves, clearly dissapointed. He wishes you good luck in your travels and goes his own way with his army. Let's hope that luck smiles to both of us.
Smotted In The Crib

The nascent rebellion was quickly defeated before it could attract dangerous characters. Our general lets those who no longer have the will to fight disperse. They were never our true target, and now they better understand the difference between a mere belligerent mob and a real army.\\n
A Band Of Weaklings Ignored

Our general laughs in their face. We left the weakling camp without laying a finger on them. They scatter quickly and desperately as we move away, the mere threat of our presence driving them from their reckless stupidity.
Defeated Bandits

Dust settles on the battlefield. The members of the bandit regiment lie dead or captured on the field, none of them will ever see the light of day or trouble our empire again. By torturing their leader, we discovered their lair and took everything they stole to aid the empire's war effort.
An Uneventful Night

Come morning there are no more strange noises in the surroundings, just the expected sounds of the road. The advance party reports that behind the hill are the remains of a recently vacated camp. The bandits may have chosen not to attack at night due to the heavy guard posted by the general and the clear defensive position of the army. Maybe dodging them was for our own good?
Cropped Ears

The incursion has been repelled, the invaders dead on the battlefield. The army feels motivated and take the lessons of the battle for themselves. Studying the weapons of the high elves they understand how to have a better defense against bows and hide from the eyes of enemies. Maybe with the help of our god it will work for a while?
A Suit of Scales

The incursion has been repelled, the invaders dead on the battlefield. The army feels motivated and take the lessons of the battle for themselves. By studying the weapons of the lizardmen and their skin we understand how to improve our defenses to increase our durability in battle. Maybe with the help of our god it will work for a while?
false
Drowned Twice

The incursion has been repelled, the invaders dead on the battlefield. The army feels motivated and take the lessons of the battle for themselves. By studying the magic of the enemy we learn a couple of things that could help our survival. Maybe with the help of our god it will work for a while?
false
Territorial Plunder

The raid takes some of the riches from the land of interest you are on. Although they are repelled by the inhabitants, a wave of devastation is seen throughout the territory. The people of your land and of this land give you the nickname "The Dishonored".
The Bull By The Horns

We have surprised the beastmen, beating them on their own ground. The forest, dyed red, seems to breathe a sigh of tranquility. The soldiers are motivated after the skirmish. The world has been purified of the alimanhas that torment it.
A Rat In The Trap

Despite being masters of subterfuge, the skaven were unable to prevent the army's quick reaction and were devastated on the spot. Despite the number of dead, it is clear that many of them were able to escape. Regardless, taking out the skaven at their own game is clearly a sign of luck. we are blessed.
Massacre Averted
The danger past, it turns out you avoided a likely deadly ambush. The enemies, seeing that the army was rapidly retreating, could not surround it and ended up abandoning their attack.
A Green Memory

The greenskins and their legendary leader lie on the ground, defeated and strangely content. Apparently it was a memorable battle for them. They give us a powerful artifact and tell us that they will see us again for the next battle!
A Fitting End

The dead dark elves occupy the plain as far as the eye can see. There is no trace of the leaders of the slavers and no sign that they can quickly reform again. In the end the people of your empire are safe. They won't be showing up around here for a while. They find artifacts in the main leader's tent. They will be better used by our forces.
Broken Bloodsucker Teeth

The necromancer and his few remaining hosts rushed out as if they themselves had seen a ghost. Apparently the pile of bones that remains is so high, our wizards think it will take weeks to melt away. An incredibly luxurious carriage, filled with relics, is the only thing left intact on the battlefield. It will be put to good use for our forces.
false
An Airy Tomb

Come morning the reanimated bones of those who came to stop us move no more. Only the other army that followed the marauders remains and was lost to sight during the battle. From this encounter we find riches among the objects of the fallen. But something tells us that taking them may not be a good idea, since we will probably suffer the same fate as the marauders. Anyway, the army headquarters determines that it is too good an opportunity to pass up, so we take the relics that we find before continuing our march.
An Oath Fulfilled

You have helped the dwarves regain their honor. Somehow the legendary duo survived. Felix carries a passed out Gotrek to safety while we finish the last slayer; his time has not yet come. Will he possibly write about this new adventure of the dwarf, what will he put about us?
Wise Retreat

We left behind the powerful and dangerous army that we had in front of us. We don't know what could have happened if we faced them but at least we can be sure that we will live to tell about another day.
A Gift from Khorne
Skarbrand begins to fade back into the chaos he was born into. "WORTHY!" he seems to laugh as he fades away "KHORNE SEND HIS BLESSINGS TO YOU". Gives you a Khorne Cache. "FOR THE BATTLES TO COME."
From Beyond The Warp

The weapon before you seems otherworldly. The blade always seems to move without letting you see how and making a strange sound. Bringing the moving blade close to anything seems to destroy it with great ease. It seems to feed on what you kill. Better not let anyone but your forces take possession of it. You carry it with you to prevent someone else from having it.
Khorne Understand You Want a Challenge
The master of war, look at your victory with appreciation. Khorne rewards the best warriors. Your army is reinvigorated and fortified. War calls you!
A Gift from Khorne

Valkya smiles as her last warrior falls. To the Khornate it does not matter where the blood flows as long as the blood flows. She points to a forest near a stash semi-hidden by the terrain. "Sooner or later you will serve. And I will delight to fight by your side when you do." You see here flying through the sky, and disappear. Beautiful and terrible you wonder what blessing awaits you.
The Damned Spear

The spear before you is clearly cursed. You feel a vibrating and terrifying power. If you touch the spear you feel that it can emit devastating power if you wish. Better not let anyone but your forces take possession of it. You carry it with you to prevent someone else from having it.
Khorne Understand You Want a Challenge
The master of war, look at your victory with appreciation. Khorne rewards the best warriors. Your army is reinvigorated and fortified. War calls you!
A Gift from Khorne

The demons disappear defeated. They find it unbelievable that they were defeated as they desperately try to get back to reality. “Belakor will destroy me… NOOOOO!” The leader of the demons drops a stash hidden on his back. The other demons try to reach him, but as they get closer they burn and are quickly dispelled into chaos. The presence of the God of War urges you to approach the cursed treasure...
The Ever Regenerating Blade

The blade of this weapon has strange teeth all the way around it. You feel as if the weapon is alive and has accumulated the life of the things it managed to kill. Better not let anyone but your forces take possession of it. You carry it with you to prevent someone else from having it.
Khorne Understand You Want a Challenge
The master of war, look at your victory with appreciation. Khorne rewards the best warriors. Your army is reinvigorated and fortified. War calls you!
A Gift from Khorne

Azazel smiles. He feels how with the defeat of the armies following him the sword loses its power over him. "Have it if you want it, it's useful but I don't like something about it. Well it was fun while it lasted. I know who I can turn to to get me out of trouble." He smiles at you and you feel strangely happy to see his smile. Seeing him fly away makes you feel somehow sad. You look at the sword... maybe you could put it to some use.
The Corrupted Blade

The sword is clearly cursed. You feel the influence of the rage marked on the blade but at the same time you feel the wildness in it. Rarely, this blade seems to be marked by two opposing gods of chaos creating a strange balance in it. Better not let anyone but your forces take possession of it. You carry it with you to prevent someone else from having it.
Azzazel's Prank

This sword has nothing special. It appears to be a simple sword, useful but nothing more. You hear Azzazel laugh in the distance. It seems that this time the demon did it just for fun, but your troops still welcome the experience and the loot of defeating his pursuers.
A Gift from Khorne Rejected

You feel Khorne's gaze intensify. You feel the violence of your heart rise and a sense of shame. You and your army shamefully avoided the challenge and now a sense of murderous desire haunts you. Your eyes are clouded with red. You should avoid battles for a while...
Khorne Understand You Want a Challenge
The master of war, look at your victory with appreciation. Khorne rewards the best warriors. Your army is reinvigorated and fortified. War calls you!
A Gift from Slaanesh

Sigvald runs terrified and curses you. "Ugly creature one day I will kill you and drink from your horrible skull!". Checking out his shop you find a stash that seems to clearly beckon you. Apparently Sigvald tried to open it and when he couldn't he left marks everywhere in a fit of jealousy. It opens just by putting your hands on it...
Slaanesh Wants Your Favour

A sword of unparalleled beauty lies before you. It does not appear to have any type of corruption as you expected from the giver, it simply appears to have been made out of obsession for the art of blacksmithing in search of perfection. You test it by destroying everything in the geld prince's tent. It is not only beautiful but extremely useful. You take it with you.
Slaanesh Favours You
The dark prince finds you amusing. He blesses you for your strength and skill in fulfilling his desire. You feel strangely empowered, it seems that he wishes you to amuse it further.
A Gift from Slaanesh

N'Kari trembles but not with anger, but with pleasure. "I always love a good challenge! He moves his tongue ecstatically, licking his lips. "Enter the next room, your prize is waiting for you." He touches your face and you feel compelled to obey. As you enter the room the castle begins to shake and slowly disappears leaving only the room you are in. In that room you find...
An Useful Follower

A strange man seems to write in a beautiful little notebook. He has elven traits but he also appears to be human and you can't set a specific race for him. He stops and greets you in an ostentatious manner. He shows an extreme devotion to you, praising you whenever you want and telling your troops about your greatness and glory. They seem to be motivated by his speeches so you decide to take it with you on your travels.
Slaanesh Favours You
The dark prince finds you amusing. He blesses you for your strength and skill in fulfilling his desire. You feel strangely empowered, it seems that he wishes you to amuse it further.
A Gift from Slaanesh

Morathi escapes sacrificing part of her army to survive. With her betrayal foiled, we shouldn't see the dark elf again for some time. You feel a delighted laugh echo in your head. You don't know how you know but you follow a path in the dark protected by your best men. You find a broken carriage on the road. You check it without thinking.
Slaanesh Lover Joins You

Sitting in the carriage is a shackled woman of unparalleled beauty. You can't understand why but looking at her you feel like you're looking at not one, but multiple women. She looks at you and her face seems to stop in the face of a woman for you irresistible and you feel a shudder and a strange feeling of wanting to protect her. You carry it with you, not knowing exactly why but doing it anyway.
Slaanesh Favours You
The dark prince finds you amusing. He blesses you for your strength and skill in fulfilling his desire. You feel strangely empowered, it seems that he wishes you to amuse it further.
A Gift from Slaanesh Rejected

A sensation of drowsiness and impressive debauchery takes hold of you. You feel the Dark Prince's disappointment and anger. You and your army don't seem ready to fight but feel compelled to do so. You must be careful with what battles you fight...
Cleaning Up An Old Tower

We find the tower of a reclusive mage. In the floor small pieces of gold and in the walls small scribles of arcane knowledge that tells the stories of times long past. You absorb everything you can of it.
A Too Vivid Dream

You wake up with a chill and cold sweat all over your body. The dream was extremely vivid and you feel the adrenaline still running through your body as if you had been about to go into combat. But it was just a dream, nothing more. You feel reinvigorated by a strange force and you understand that the dream vision will eventually pass. You must prepare for the battle to come!\\n
A Tribute From The Smithy

My warmest regards, my lord. Thank you for protecting our smithy from our enemies and the dangers that surround us. The master blacksmith sends you the promised tribute for your investment and protection. Use it for your war effort!
